**Requirements:** Intelligence ≥ 3

You have discovered how to channel magical energy directly into physical objects. You are a diabolist—awakened to magical power through research and experimentation rather than born with it. Through careful study of how pneuma interacts with matter, you learned to infuse temporary magical properties into items, creating enchanted objects that hold power for brief periods.
